name: Fiends Forever
description:
You are a young incubus, sent from the depths of hell on your Rite of Passage to become a full-fledged demon. You must harness the power of desire from the women of Earth, and become more powerful yourself. However, there is more to this task than meets the eye. and conflict is brewing between the ethereal forces of dark and light.

Support the project on Patreon!
